Title: Imitation Krabs
Plot: In another attempt to steal the Krabby Patty formula, Plankton makes a robot that looks just like Mr. Krabs. But in order to get the formula, he will have to do some odd things as part of the "secret handshake."
Writer: Aaron Springer, Merriweather Williams, C. H. Green
GuestStars: Tom Kenny,  Sirena Irwin,  Dee Bradley Baker,  Marion Ross
